g.text: of(s: S, a: A): StateTuple<S, A>
create(run: Function<S, Kind<F_WITNESS, StateTuple<S, A>>>, monadF: Monad<F_WITNESS>): StateT<S, F_WITNESS, A>
narrow(kind: Kind<StateTKind.Witness<S, F_WITNESS>, A>): StateT<S, F_WITNESS, A>
widen(stateT: StateT<S, F_WITNESS, A>): Kind<StateTKind.Witness<S, F_WITNESS>, A>
runStateT(kind: Kind<StateTKind.Witness<S, F_WITNESS>, A>, s: S): Kind<F_WITNESS, StateTuple<S, A>>
evalStateT(kind: Kind<StateTKind.Witness<S, F_WITNESS>, A>, s: S): Kind<F_WITNESS, A>
execStateT(kind: Kind<StateTKind.Witness<S, F_WITNESS>, A>, s: S): Kind<F_WITNESS, S>
lift(fn: Function<S, Kind<F_WITNESS, StateTuple<S,A>>>, monadF: Monad<F_WITNESS>) : Kind<StateTKind.Witness<S, F_WITNESS>, A>
depends on (holds ref to underlying monadF)
depends on (holds ref to underlying monadF)
uses (in its run function's return type)
